member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.Examples
member.summary: Gets usage for SeleniumPerfXML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.Browser
member.summary: Gets or sets the browser set in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.Environment
member.summary: Gets or sets the environment set in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.URL
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL set in the XML. By default, the URL is derived by the environment provided.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.RespectRepeatFor
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to respect RespectRepeatFor flag in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.RespectRunAodaFlag
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to respect RunAODAFlag in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.TimeOutThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout threshold in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.WarningThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the warning threshold in the XML. Warning must be less than Timeout.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.DataFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the datafile in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.CSVSaveFileLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSV file location in the XML.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.LogSaveLocation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the log save location in the XML.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.ReportSaveLocation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the log save location in the XML.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.ScreenShotSaveLocation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the screenshot save location in the XML.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.name: P:SeleniumPerfXML.SeleniumPerfXMLOptions.XMLFile
member.summary:
Gets or sets the screenshot save location in the XML.
If not set, will use the directory path of CSVSaveFileLocation.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Description Description mandatory set EXACTLY to test actions set in XML in child classes for reflection to work.

member.summary: Executes the test action based on the provided information and settings.
member.param: Indicates whether to log this test case or not.
The test step name for this action.
Indicates whether to perform this action or not.
Indicates whether to run AODA scripts after this action.
Indicates the page name to pass to AODA scripts.
Provides the XML information for this test action.
Passes on the driver instance used to interact with the browser.
Passes on the csv logger used to log results.

member.name: T:SeleniumPerfXML.TestActions.TimeAndLogAspect
member.summary: This aspect is used to surround a test action with try and catch, while timing each action. If the test action is successful (no errors performing the action / passed in not to perform action), then runAODA if specified.
